extendedInfo.description: "Star Trek Series" app contains the full listing of all episodes of all Star Trek TV series. Complete with information like director, writers, air date, stardate, descriptions, and so on. All this customized with look and feel of LCARS design.Contains the episode listing of:- Star Trek: The Original Series- Star Trek: The Animated Series- Star Trek: The Next Generation- Star Trek: Deep Space Nine- Star Trek: Voyager- Star Trek: EnterpriseCopyright notices:Star Trek (including but not limited to Star Trek: The Next Generation, Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, Star Trek: Voyager, Star Trek: Enterprise), and the various logo devices used in them, are copyright Paramount Pictures, as are the characters, related images, and sound from the productions. This application is not endorsed or supported by Paramount Pictures.

reviews.comment: Great APP: AppBrain Ad Detector and WakeLock report no nefarious activity\t03AUG2013:  Great Star Trek Reference APP, works well on my HTC One-X.  I recently started using BrainAPP Ad Detector and WakeLock neither detected nefarious activity regarding this APP.  These two APPs check for Push-Ads which go to the Taskbar or pop-up on the Home Screen, the potential to collect E-mail addresses, and large amounts of CPU Interruptions or Screen Wake requests.
reviews.author: Craig Knapp

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Complete application that allows you to query all the most important data of this wonderful classic.
reviews.author: Anderson Daltoe
